title: taliyah's W is broken
body: it is much harder to aim IMHO - was much easier to pull off the combo pre-patch.

replies.body:
No it's not, get used to the new W casting and you will be fine.

This discussion has been had.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=GpxkEkcE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-14T11:18:47.218+0000)
>
> No it's not, get used to the new W casting and you will be fine.
> 
> This discussion has been had.

yeah I might have over-reacted a little bit (thats why I tempered my previous posts a little). I'm getting used to it now.
Just that my first post patch match I got ruined harder than I've ever been ruined because I wasnt aware that W had changed to vector cast and I was frustrated AF.
